description:
Take on our top-secret training games and transform into the ultimate ninja!
Pass around Joy-Con™ controllers and play with up to four players!
We've got every tool a ninja needs—throwing stars, ninja swords, grappling hooks, and even flying squirrels!
Learn an array of ninjutsu skills!

Embark on your training alone as you build up your coin collection,
or overcome each challenge in order and be crowned the Shinobi King!

Throwing Star Jutsu
- Hit all the targets with your throwing stars!

Water-Walking Jutsu
- Dash across the water's surface with your water-walking shoes!

Vanishing Jutsu
- Get up to no good with a game of tag in a mansion of trickery!

Grappling Hook Jutsu
- Use your grappling hook to reach the highest peak!

Ninja Sword Jutsu
- Seize victory with your blade in an intense tournament!

Transformation Jutsu
- Transform into an animal and race to the goal!

Hand Signal Jutsu
- Activate your ninjutsu with hand signals and take out the enemy!

Flying Squirrel Jutsu
- Glide through the sky and grab gold coins!

Blowpipe Jutsu
- Get your aim just right and shoot the targets with your blowpipe!

High-Speed Jutsu
- Pick up gold coins and be the first to the finish line!
name: Our Ninja World
